name: Cersei Lannister
text: You're Cersei lannister, you may be sligtly incestious but you have an inspiring appetite for power and very assertive.

name: John Snow
text: AHHH another potentially incestious character... you are a trusting person and that thing you do with your tongue john snow...

name: Daenerys Targaryen
text: Your traits show you have a thing for Dragons, conquering with class and maybe your nephew?

name: Samwell Tarly
text: Samwell has a heart of gold, he has your best interest at heart and will do anything to prove his worth as a grandmaester, you're a curious maester

name: Grey Worm
text: Cheery? you're serious about what you do and have low cheerfulness

name: Tyrion Lannister
text: You have serious daddy issues and look for approval from different sources

name: Hodor
text: Hodor... A man of few words. you should hodor more...

name: Davos Seaworth
text: Davos is a humble man who enjoys a drink, he has no real personality but he is okay etc
